name: EarnestLiving
0:
”Alexa, turn on aroma diffuser”
”Alexa, turn off aroma diffuser”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can simply ask Alexa to control your Earnest Living products. After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
1. Download our “Earnest Living” app in app market, then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in “Earnest Living” app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Enable “Earnest Living” skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”;
5. Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
Alexa, turn on aroma diffuser.
Alexa, turn off aroma diffuser.
Alexa, set light brightness to 50%.
Alexa, set light to green.
Alexa, set the timer to 1 hour.
Alexa, turn on aroma diffuser at 9 am.
Alexa, set the mist to large.
Alexa, set aroma diffuser humidity to 50%.
